类 SimpleTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AlphabetCarrying, java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleTokenizer
extends Pipe
    A simple unicode tokenizer that accepts sequences of letters as tokens.
